attributes.action: STOP Ofgem's approval of the monthly debt recovery charge on energy bills.
attributes.background: Inform Ofgem that it is out if order to impose this charge on people who are possible struggling themselves but have managed to stay out of debt.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about the energy price cap are a matter for Ofgem, not the UK Government or Parliament.
